results.content:
Comprehensive! 

I primarily work server side and my experience with React was a lot of fiddling/hacking snippets to get basic stuff to work. This wasn't going to cut it for more serious work and needed a deeper understanding - and this course shines there. 

From State Hooks to Reducers to Redux, following Basir's code walkthroughs diligently helped me confidently understand the internals of React a lot more. Still prefer Python :-), but definitely much more confident about my React/JavaScript now.
results.content_html:
Comprehensive!

I primarily work server side and my experience with React was a lot of fiddling/hacking snippets to get basic stuff to work. This wasn't going to cut it for more serious work and needed a deeper understanding - and this course shines there.

From State Hooks to Reducers to Redux, following Basir's code walkthroughs diligently helped me confidently understand the internals of React a lot more. Still prefer Python :-), but definitely much more confident about my React/JavaScript now.
